scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Megan Tristao
scrape.text: I had heard horrible things about this book, so it wasn't as bad as I expected. However, it seemed a little long to accomplish the plot, and there were a lot of unanswered questions at the end. I wouldn't NOT recommend it if you're interested in reading it, but I also wouldn't recommend it if you've never heard of it. ;)
